functions.name: run_auggie
functions.signature:
def run_auggie(
    *,
    instruction: str,
    input_text: str | None = None,
    workspace_root: str | None = None,
    model: str | None = None,
    compact: bool | None = None,
    github_api_token: str | None = None,
    extra_args: Sequence[str] | None = None,
    timeout_seconds: float | None = None,
    session_token: str | None = None,
    binary_path: str | None = None,
) -> AuggieRunResult
functions.parameters:
(
    *,
    instruction: str,
    input_text: str | None = None,
    workspace_root: str | None = None,
    model: str | None = None,
    compact: bool | None = None,
    github_api_token: str | None = None,
    extra_args: Sequence[str] | None = None,
    timeout_seconds: float | None = None,
    session_token: str | None = None,
    binary_path: str | None = None,
)
functions.docstring: Execute the Auggie CLI with the provided options.

functions.name: run_auggie_command
functions.signature:
def run_auggie_command(
    *,
    args: Sequence[str],
    input_text: str | None = None,
    timeout_seconds: float | None = None,
    session_token: str | None = None,
    binary_path: str | None = None,
) -> AuggieRunResult
functions.parameters:
(
    *,
    args: Sequence[str],
    input_text: str | None = None,
    timeout_seconds: float | None = None,
    session_token: str | None = None,
    binary_path: str | None = None,
)
functions.docstring: Execute Auggie with arbitrary arguments.

functions.name: get_capabilities
functions.signature: def get_capabilities() -> dict[str, Any]
functions.docstring: Expose high-level information about registered MCP interfaces.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://capabilities",
    name="Augment Capabilities",
    description="Discover available Augment MCP tools, resources, and prompts",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: get_workspace_settings
functions.signature: def get_workspace_settings(workspace_path: str) -> dict[str, Any]
functions.parameters: (workspace_path: str)
functions.docstring: Expose Augment settings for the provided workspace.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://workspace/{workspace_path}/settings",
    name="Augment Workspace Settings",
    description="Current Augment configuration and tool permissions for a workspace",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: get_custom_commands
functions.signature: def get_custom_commands(workspace_path: str) -> dict[str, Any]
functions.parameters: (workspace_path: str)
functions.docstring: Enumerate workspace and user-level Augment command files.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://workspace/{workspace_path}/commands",
    name="Augment Custom Commands",
    description="List available Augment custom command definitions",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: get_workspace_tree
functions.parameters:
(
    workspace_path: str,
    max_depth: int | None = None,
)
functions.docstring: Return a truncated directory tree for the workspace.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://workspace/{workspace_path}/tree",
    name="Augment Workspace Tree",
    description="Directory structure snapshot for the workspace",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: get_index_status
functions.signature: def get_index_status(workspace_path: str) -> dict[str, Any]
functions.parameters: (workspace_path: str)
functions.docstring: Read Augment index status metadata when available.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://workspace/{workspace_path}/index-status",
    name="Augment Index Status",
    description="Status information for Augment workspace indexing",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: get_command_details
functions.parameters:
(
    workspace_path: str,
    command_name: str,
)
functions.docstring: Return command metadata and body for a specific command name.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://workspace/{workspace_path}/command/{command_name}",
    name="Augment Command Details",
    description="Metadata and content for a specific Augment custom command",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: search_workspace
functions.parameters:
(
    workspace_path: str,
    query: str | None = None,
    max_results: int = 20,
    context_lines: int = 2,
)
functions.docstring: Search workspace files using ripgrep, grep, or a Python fallback.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://workspace/{workspace_path}/search",
    name="Augment Workspace Search",
    description="Search workspace files for a query string",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": False},
)

functions.name: get_auggie_history
functions.signature: def get_auggie_history(scope: str = "global", limit: int = 50) -> dict[str, Any]
functions.parameters: (scope: str = "global", limit: int = 50)
functions.docstring: Return recent Auggie execution history.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://history/{scope}/runs",
    name="Auggie Run History",
    description="Recent Auggie CLI invocations and their results",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": False},
)

functions.name: get_performance_metrics
functions.signature: def get_performance_metrics(scope: str = "server") -> dict[str, Any]
functions.parameters: (scope: str = "server")
functions.docstring: Expose telemetry metrics collected by the server.
decorators:
@mcp.resource(
    "augment://metrics/{scope}/performance",
    name="Performance Metrics",
    description="Server performance metrics and aggregated statistics",
    mime_type="application/json",
    annotations={"readOnlyHint": True, "idempotentHint": True},
)

functions.name: augment_review
functions.signature:
def augment_review(
    instruction: str,
    context: str | None = None,
    paths: list[str] | None = None,
    workspace_root: str | None = None,
    model: str | None = None,
    compact: bool | None = None,
    github_api_token: str | None = None,
    timeout_ms: int | None = None,
    extra_args: list[str] | None = None,
    binary_path: str | None = None,
    session_token: str | None = None,
) -> str
functions.parameters:
(
    instruction: str,
    context: str | None = None,
    paths: list[str] | None = None,
    workspace_root: str | None = None,
    model: str | None = None,
    compact: bool | None = None,
    github_api_token: str | None = None,
    timeout_ms: int | None = None,
    extra_args: list[str] | None = None,
    binary_path: str | None = None,
    session_token: str | None = None,
)
functions.docstring: Invoke Auggie CLI with the provided instruction and context.
decorators: @mcp.tool(name="augment_review", description="Use Auggie to review artifacts with Augment context engine")

functions.name: security_review_prompt
functions.parameters:
(
    file_path: str,
    focus_areas: str = "all",
    severity_threshold: str = "medium",
)
functions.docstring: Prompt template for requesting a security-focused review.

functions.parameters:
(
    file_path: str,

    preserve_behavior: bool = True,
)
functions.docstring: Prompt template for structured refactoring guidance.

functions.parameters:
(
    file_path: str,

)
functions.docstring: Prompt template for generating tests covering a file or module.

functions.parameters:
(
    file_path: str,

)
functions.docstring: Prompt template for API design analysis.

functions.name: analyze_performance_prompt
functions.parameters:
(
    file_path: str,
    focus: list[str] | None = None,
    include_benchmarks: bool = False,
)
functions.docstring: Prompt template encouraging structured performance analysis.

functions.name: augment_configure
functions.parameters:
(
    workspace_root: str,
    permissions: Any,
    scope: Literal["user", "project"] = "project",
)
functions.docstring: Write Augment permission configuration to the appropriate settings file.
